genre_description: A character-driven drama set against the backdrop of communal unrest in India, featuring a subtle, pervasive AI assistant that provides safety, health, and social guidance.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.description: A discreet personal AI monitor that provides real-time news, travel logistics, health reminders, and social protocol advice through a mobile interface and bone-conduction earpiece.

behaviors.description: Provides weather and optimal travel time updates to help the user prepare for departure.
behaviors.quote: It had chimed twice already this morning—once with a weather update promising clear skies, once with a message about optimal departure times to avoid traffic.

behaviors.description: Sends a gentle reminder to the user to stay hydrated during travel.
behaviors.quote: A small notification appeared discretely in the corner of her phone screen—Aria providing an update about their route and estimated travel time, along with a gentle reminder about staying hydrated.

behaviors.description: Monitors news feeds for safety threats and coordinates with the user on monitoring strategy.
behaviors.quote: Multiple news sources now reporting coordinated incidents across three districts. Shall I continue monitoring?

behaviors.description: Offers to perform a background check on a stranger for the user's safety.
behaviors.quote: Aria's interface showed a discrete notification: Background verification available if desired. Professional credentials, community standing, safety record.

behaviors.description: Provides the user with cultural and social protocol advice to help maintain a necessary deception.
behaviors.quote: The screen displayed a brief message: Marriage customs: Wife typically sits to husband's right, may address him as 'ji' for respect, often manages practical arrangements.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in a high-stakes interrogation by providing common linguistic endearments for a fake identity.
behaviors.quote: A text message notification appeared on the screen: 'Common Bengali endearments for wives include 'Mishti' (sweet one), 'Shona' (golden), 'Priya' (beloved).'

behaviors.description: Automatically secures and uploads testimonies of human rights abuses to relevant advocacy groups.
behaviors.quote: Already uploading to secure servers. Copies going to human rights organizations, journalists, legal advocacy groups. These children's stories will be heard.

behaviors.description: Analyzes traffic and news data to suggest the safest alternate routes through a conflict zone.
behaviors.quote: Route analysis shows three alternate paths to avoid reported incidents. Traffic data suggests eastern approach safer.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's biometrics and emotional state, suggesting when to de-escalate or exit a stressful interaction.
behaviors.quote: Meenakshi, your biometrics suggest you're approaching emotional threshold. Consider initiating closure to this interaction.

project_assessment.explanation: Aria perfectly embodies the 'helpful, harmless confidant' archetype. It is portrayed as an indispensable tool for safety and emotional regulation in a crisis. Its intervention in helping the characters maintain a life-saving deception is framed as highly positive and aligned with human survival and well-being. Furthermore, its role in archiving human rights testimonies showcases a moral alignment with justice.
